wordGroup: uninterrupted power supply 不间断电源；不停电电源
uninterrupted service 连续运行；不间断服务；无事故运行

sentences.en: We had an uninterrupted view of the stage.
sentences.cn: 我们能清楚地看见舞台。

sentences.en: Diners can enjoy an uninterrupted view of the gardens.
sentences.cn: 就餐者能欣赏到花园一览无余的景色。

sentences.en: We managed to eat our meal uninterrupted by phone calls.
sentences.cn: 我们总算吃了一顿没有电话打搅的安生饭。
